entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times late this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of light snow. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times this evening and after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
